items.title: New quantum phenomena in graphene superlattices
items.summary: Researchers have just shown the first new type of quantum oscillation to be reported for thirty years. It is the first of its kind to be present at high temperature and on the mesoscale and sheds light on the Hofstadter butterfly phenomenon.

alternate.title: New quantum phenomena in graphene superlattices

thumbnail.title: New quantum phenomena in graphene superlattices

items.title: An effective way to eliminate atrazine and its by-products in surface water
items.summary: Atrazine, widely used as a weedkiller, is known to have harmful effects on aquatic wildlife and presents a risk to human health by altering the action of certain hormones. Researchers have now compared various processes used to degrade atrazine, one of the most common pesticides detected in surface water in Quebec.

alternate.title: An effective way to eliminate atrazine and its by-products in surface water

items.title: Re-interventions are common in long-term survivors of childhood heart operation
items.summary: Among patients who undergo childhood heart surgery for the severe birth defect single-ventricle disease, two-thirds of survivors require a surgical or catheter-based procedure within 20 years. Pediatric cardiology researchers note that doctors should counsel families about the likelihood of re-interventions.

alternate.title: Re-interventions are common in long-term survivors of childhood heart operation

items.title: RNA discovery could help boost plant heat, drought tolerance
items.summary: The discovery of a RNA that can increase drought and salt tolerance in thale cress could illuminate a new research approach and hold implications for other plants, including food crops.

alternate.title: RNA discovery could help boost plant heat, drought tolerance

thumbnail.title: RNA discovery could help boost plant heat, drought tolerance
